name: American Truck Parking
description:
Driving the truck on an exciting road, enjoy the comfort of music, enjoy the beautiful scenery along the way, feel the real environment outside the window climate. Show off your driving ability to parking your truck. As a real freight truck driver, prove your strength, you are the best truck driver.

Features:
- Real truck driving experience
- Realistic physical effects
- Real scene environment
- a challenging road
- Simple and smooth control
- High quality music and sound effects
